meanings.definition: The state or quality of being hidden.
meanings.sent1: The hiddennesses of the treasure made it difficult to find.
meanings.sent2: The hiddennesses of the forest provided a sense of mystery.
meanings.sent3: The hiddennesses of the cat always made it a challenge to locate during hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The hiddennesses of her emotions were like a deep, dark cave waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The hiddennesses of the cave added an element of adventure to the exploration.

meanings.sent1: The map revealed the hiddennesses of secret compartments in the old house.
meanings.sent2: The hiddennesses of the keys made it impossible to unlock the door.
meanings.sent3: The hiddennesses of the cookies in the jar led to a fun scavenger hunt.
meanings.sent4: The hiddennesses of the stars in the night sky captivated the young astronomer.
meanings.sent5: The hiddennesses of the treasure chest added excitement to the pirate's quest.
